title: Mobile Mathematics Competency Enhancement Course Based on Blended Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Grasp of elementary math concepts and practical application experience
context.additional_context: Blended learning design required for current practitioners, combining self-directed learning in mobile environments with real-time online sessions, operated with formative assessments in a digital device-provided setting.

learning_goals: Learners can acquire strategies to solve 10 applied math problems within five days via mobile apps
Learners can present three math modeling case studies based on peer feedback during real-time video sessions
